Title: "The Counterfeit King" by D.V. Bishop

"The Counterfeit King" is a thrilling crime novel that revolves around the creation of counterfeit products. The protagonist, Sam, is a seasoned detective who has recently been transferred to the Economic Crime Unit due to his reputation for tenacity and problem-solving skills.

In the novel, Sam is assigned to a case involving a significant counterfeiting operation that is affecting the economy and the reputation of the city. The counterfeit products range from luxury goods to currency, and the scale of the operation is massive.

Sam soon finds himself in a race against time as the counterfeit king, a mysterious and elusive criminal mastermind, starts to target those who are helping Sam in his investigation. The story takes several unexpected turns as Sam delves deeper into the world of counterfeiting, uncovering a web of corruption that reaches the highest levels of society.

"The Counterfeit King" is a gripping story that combines intricate plotting with well-drawn characters and an insightful look into the shadowy world of counterfeit operations. It offers a compelling read for fans of crime fiction, especially those who enjoy stories involving complex investigations and high-stakes twists.
